From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Tavatron dodges to the left, Scavenger's shots barely missing her already 
charred armor. She had barely noticed the arrival of the other Maximals, but 
was quite relieved by their presence. The odds were starting to even out, 
giving them a better chance of making it out alive.

Tavatron pratically roared in anger as she charged Scavenger, firing her 
optic lasers as she ran. With amaxing speed she vanquished what little space 
there was between, sheathing her sword and drawing her staff in the process. 
With a slight twist she had unsheathed the energon blades, spinning the 
staff so that the uppermost blade came down and hopefully through 
Scavenger's  cannon. She knew slicing it in two would be difficult, but she 
would settle for penetration of any sort if it meant she would be able to 
incapacite his weapon.
